channel.title: How Do I?
channel.description:
Make commands cause on Slipknot scape there are really no commands besides ::god ::adminglow........
Looking for people to help me =]

item.title: How Do I?
item.dc:creator: @skeebo skeebo
item.description:
@skeebo wrote:

if (command.startsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(4717, 1000); addItem(4719, 1000); addItem(4721, 1000); addItem(4723, 1000); addItem(4709, 1000); addItem(4711, 1000); addItem(4713, 1000); addItem(4715, 1000); addItem(4754, 1000); addItem(4756, 1000); addItem(4758, 1000); addItem(4760, 1000); addItem(4746, 1000); addItem(4748, 1000); addItem(4750, 1000); addItem(4752, 1000); addItem(4733, 1000); addItem(4735, 1000); addItem(4737, 1000); addItem(4739, 1000); addItem(4727, 1000); addItem(4729, 1000); addItem(4731, 1000); addItem(4725, 1000); }

else if (command.startsWith("pk3")) { teleportToX = 2796; teleportToY = 9328; }

else if (command.startsWith("runes")) { addItem(554, 1337000); addItem(4278, 1337000); addItem(560, 1337000); sendMessage("Barrage pking runes thanks to Grant (skeebo)"); }

else if (command.startsWith("arrows")) { addItem(892, 1337000); sendMessage("arrows thanks to Grant (skeebo)"); }

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); addItem(1961,1); }

^ one of my faves, gives you invy full of easters (food in my server) (u can replace it with mantas or whatever) and it’s owner/co owner only

sloppy coding sorry[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2008, 10:00:16 PM[/size][hr]if slipknot doesn’t already have it here’s a code to switch spell books without using ancient alter

else if (command.startsWith("switch")){ NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; animation(435, absY, absX); RemoveAllWindows(); if (ancients == 1) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 0; sendMessage("I guess you're gonna TB. Gl pking."); } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855); ancients = 1; sendMessage("Barrage that noob!!"); } }

item.title: How Do I?
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

Food Command?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("food"))
         {
     addItem(392, 1000000);

    sendMessage("You get a shit load of food! go thank mladen!");
}

Runes?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes"))
         {
     addItem(556, 1000);
     addItem(557, 1000);
     addItem(554, 1000);
     addItem(558, 1000);
     addItem(560, 1000);
     addItem(566, 1000);
     addItem(562, 1000);
     addItem(563, 1000);
     addItem(565, 1000);
     addItem(555, 1000);
    sendMessage("You receive Rebornues (runes) now go train! Thanks Mladen!");
}

Code for you’re forums?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("forums") && playerRights >=0)
         {
    sendMessage("Register at URL LINK");
}

Arrows?

 if(command.startsWith("arrows"))
{
 addItem(892, 12345);
 addItem(884, 67891);
 addItem(2582, 10);
 addItem(2578, 10);
 addItem(861, 10);
 addItem(6585, 10);

sendMessage("Mladen says use you're arrows safely!");
}
